chapters.title: Chapter 45: A Bitter Thought
chapters.info: Bain, p. 565 (793)—A Maiden of the Spear of the Black Rock sept of the Shaarad Aiel. She has flame-colored hair. She is first-sister to Chiad, of the Goshien Aiel; the two had to sneak through the camp of the other to find the Wise Ones to become first sisters, since their clans were in blood feud at the time. See also Chiad; Gaul.
